title: Computer-delivered Mock Test
description: I have developed country's first computer-delivered mock test exactly like British Council so that you can be ready and feel comfortable in your final text. Using my online tests for IELTS preparation is proven to help students improve by 0.5 - 1.5. IELTS Mentor's unique feature allows users to “Locate” the answer within the passage and “Explain” why that answer is correct. Our community love this feature! IELTS Mentor has reached extensive cooperation with overseas institutions, international education non-profit organizations and IELTS test bureaus to provide a brand new IELTS learning platform for IELTS students around the world.

title: Complete IELTS Preparation
description: I'll help you prepare for your IELTS exam. I'll teach you all the tips and tricks you need to know in order to ace the test. IELTS Mentor is currently the most visited website in over 12 countries with more than 30K students. I am aiming toward a community website that provides IELTS test questions and exam tips for free. Students can easily take the IELTS tests on the website to quickly improve their band scores through our modern e-learning platform. Moreover, we have developed an ecosystem centered around transnational education, online learning, and study abroad to assist students in pursuing international education.
